1: It is difficult to find out what other people expect from me.
2: Most of the time I don't know how to act in social situations.
3: Sometimes I have to cover my ears to avoid painful noises (like pressure cooker bell or people talking too loudly)
4: While talking to someone, I have a hard time to mention when I need to speak and when I need to listen
5: It is difficult for me to understand how opposite person is feeling while we are talking.
6: I get extremely upset when the way I like to do things is suddenly changed.
7: I take everything too literally, for this reason I often miss what someone is trying to say.
8: It can be very hard to observe someone's face, hand, and body movements when we are talking.
9: Some basic textures that do not bother others feel very offensive when they touch my skin.
10: I have trouble making friends and also have trouble being socialized
11: When I feel overwhelmed by my sense, I have to isolate myself to get rid of them.
12: It is very difficult for me to work and co-operate in groups.

1: This is a basic measurement to assist you to determine whether you might have autism disorder that needs professional consultancy.
